|rad1chip2 = Intersil;; |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The external ''USB port'' seems to simply be a connection to an internal [http://lxr.free-electrons.com/source/drivers/net/usb/pegasus.h?v=2.6.36;a=arm Pegasus ('''ADMtek''') USB 1.1 Ethernet controller]. Specifications in this entry are imputed from '''GB''''s GPL code. There may be inaccuracies. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.gigabyte.eu/products/product-page.aspx?pid=928 Product page]
[http://download.gigabyte.eu/FileList/Manual/comm_manual_gn-br402w_e.pdf Manual]
[http://www.giga-byte.se/Support/Communication/Firmware_DownloadFile.aspx?FileType=Firmware&FileID=144 GPL code for the device (comm_br402w-gpl-11100h.zip)]
[http://www.giga-byte.se/Support/Communication/Firmware_DownloadFile.aspx?FileType=Firmware&FileID=26 ... and the latest FW (v1.11.00h, which is built by the above GPL code)] *[http://product.pconline.com.cn/pdlib/191655_bigpicture986673.html Image shots on '''product.pconline.com.cn'''] *[http://ixbtlabs.com/articles/computex2k2giga/ Stock image and mention (@ Computex 2002) on '''ixbtlabs.com'''] ===Vendor links=== *[http://www.ebay.ie/ctg/Gigabyte-10-100-Wireless-B-Router-GN-BR402W-/111334439#%7B%22Page%22%3A%22%2Fctg%2FGigabyte-10-100-Wireless-B-Router-GN-BR402W-%2F111334439%3F_aset%3D2%26_pcatid%3D706%26_rptype%3D4295%22%7D Item page (ID EPID111334439) on '''ebay.ie'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
